pageProduct.name: Voost Kids Immunity Effervescent Tablets 20 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

VOOST Kids Immunity Blackcurrant helps support immune system health with vitamin C, Elderberry + Zinc.

- Support general health and wellbeing.
- Increase absorption of dietary iron.
- Assist healthy bone development.

Suitable For: Vegan friendly.

Product Claims: No added dairy, lactose, soy or yeast.

Size: 20 Tablets

Flavour: Blackcurrant

Warnings

Not recommended for children below the age of four.
Keep out of reach of children.
Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Less than 0.1g of sugar per serve.

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients per tablet:
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 100mg, Zinc (as Zinc Gluconate) 3mg, Sambucus Nigra (Black Elderberry) (Equivalent to Sambucus Nigra Fresh 160mg) 5mg.

Contains: Each tablet contains 336mg of Sodium. Sucralose.

Directions

Take 1 tablet daily, dissolved in 200mL of water, or as directed by your health professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
